item.title: Hugo博客loveit主题升级与适配的碎碎念
item.description:
<p>先说重点：我终于做了博客<strong>移动端</strong>适配啦，主题也从<strong>LoveIt</strong>升级到了<strong>FixIt</strong>！</p>
<p>突然想起来这么个事是因为冲浪时看到了loveit的继承者fixit。这个n年没更新的主题居然有救了！于是怀着激动的心情移植了两个小时——宣布放弃。(推迟进行)</p>
<p>我以为移植是个简单的事情，却完全没想到，之前搞的jquery背景轮播+自定义css+hugo版本更新变动，导致需要在当前基础上做非常多的改动。否则博客就会变成一个丑陋的<em>乱码版</em>B4。</p>
<p>因为我如此轻敌以至于根本没切换分支，在两个小时后博客被我折腾成了四不像。只好灰溜溜的回滚，择日再战。</p>
<h3 id="移动端适配" class="heading-element"><span>移动端适配</span>
 <a href="#%e7%a7%bb%e5%8a%a8%e7%ab%af%e9%80%82%e9%85%8d" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>就在这个过程中我才想起之前的css在移动端自适应一直有问题。我调前端css的经验非常少，这次上手才知道不是让gpt output这么简单。又折腾了半个小时，终于把元素调到了一个满意的效果。</p>
<p>不说废话了上代码，把这个放到<code>assets/css/_custom.css</code>里（没有的话建一个），就能覆盖两个主题的css了。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2

<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-scss" data-lang="scss"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nc">.home-profile</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">margin-left</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="kt">rem</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">margin-right</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="kt">rem</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">background</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="nf">rgb</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">52</span><span class="o">,</span> <span class="mi">48</span><span class="o">,</span> <span class="mi">45</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="na">opacity</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mf">.85</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">color</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mh">#ffffff</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="o">[</span><span class="nt">theme</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="nt">dark</span><span class="o">]</span> <span class="nc">.home-profile</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">background</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mh">#3a3535</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="na">opacity</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mf">.8</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nc">.summary</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="na">margin-bottom</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mf">.1</span><span class="kt">rem</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">margin-left</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="kt">rem</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">margin-right</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="kt">rem</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="na">padding-left</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="kt">rem</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="na">padding-right</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="kt">rem</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">background</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="ni">white</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="na">opacity</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mf">.95</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="o">[</span><span class="nt">theme</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="nt">dark</span><span class="o">]</span> <span class="nc">.summary</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">background</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mh">#3a3535</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nc">.footer</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">display</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="ni">block</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="na">border-top-width</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="kt">px</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">border-top-style</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="ni">solid</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">border-top-color</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mh">#6670ab</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">position</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="ni">relative</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">z-index</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">max-width</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">800</span><span class="kt">px</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">width</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">60</span><span class="kt">%</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">margin</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mf">.1</span><span class="kt">rem</span> <span class="ni">auto</span> <span class="mi">0</span> <span class="ni">auto</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="na">padding-left</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="kt">rem</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="na">padding-right</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="kt">rem</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">background</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="ni">white</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="na">opacity</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mf">.95</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nc">.footer</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">display</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="ni">block</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">border-top-width</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="kt">px</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">border-top-style</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="ni">solid</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">border-top-color</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mh">#6670ab</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">position</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="ni">relative</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">z-index</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">max-width</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">800</span><span class="kt">px</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">width</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">60</span><span class="kt">%</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">margin</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="mf">.1</span><span class="kt">rem</span> <span class="ni">auto</span> <span class="mi">0</span> <span class="ni">auto</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">padding-left</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="kt">rem</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">padding-right</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="kt">rem</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">background</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="ni">white</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">opacity</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="mf">.95</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="o">[</span><span class="nt">theme</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="nt">dark</span><span class="o">]</span> <span class="nc">.footer</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">background</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mh">#3a3535</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cm">/* 目录 */</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nc">.toc</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">background</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="ni">white</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="na">opacity</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mf">.95</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="o">[</span><span class="nt">theme</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="nt">dark</span><span class="o">]</span> <span class="nc">.toc</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">background</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mh">#3a3535</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="o">[</span><span class="nt">theme</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="nt">dark</span><span class="o">]</span> <span class="nn">#toc-auto</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">border-left-color</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mh">#6f6a6a</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nc">.toc</span> <span class="nc">.toc-content</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">font-size</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mf">.8</span><span class="kt">rem</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nc">.toc</span> <span class="nc">.toc-content</span> <span class="nt">code</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">border</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="ni">none</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">color</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mh">#f7ab01</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">font-size</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="kt">em</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cm">/* 归档、标签、分类、特殊页面 */</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nc">.page.archive</span><span class="o">,</span> <span class="nc">.page.single</span><span class="o">,</span> <span class="nc">.page.single.special</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="na">padding-left</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">5</span><span class="kt">rem</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="na">padding-right</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">5</span><span class="kt">rem</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">padding-bottom</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="kt">rem</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">background</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="nf">rgb</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">255</span><span class="o">,</span> <span class="mi">255</span><span class="o">,</span> <span class="mi">255</span><span class="p">);</span>	
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="na">opacity</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mf">.95</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="o">[</span><span class="nt">theme</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="nt">dark</span><span class="o">]</span> <span class="nc">.page.archive</span><span class="o">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="o">[</span><span class="nt">theme</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="nt">dark</span><span class="o">]</span> <span class="nc">.page.single</span><span class="o">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="o">[</span><span class="nt">theme</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="nt">dark</span><span class="o">]</span> <span class="nc">.page.single.special</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">background</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mh">#3a3535</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nc">.archive-item-date2</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">color</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mh">#a9a9b3</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="o">[</span><span class="nt">theme</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="nt">dark</span><span class="o">]</span> <span class="nc">.archive</span> <span class="nc">.archive-item-date</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">color</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mh">#a9a9b3</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nc">.page.single.special</span> <span class="nc">.single-title.animated.pulse.faster</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">padding-right</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="kt">rem</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nc">.archive</span> <span class="nc">.card-item-title</span> <span class="nt">a</span> <span class="nt">sup</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">color</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mh">#a9a9b3</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="na">font-weight</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="ni">initial</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nc">.archive</span> <span class="nc">.group-title</span> <span class="nt">sup</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">color</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mh">#a9a9b3</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="na">font-weight</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="ni">initial</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nc">.archive</span> <span class="nc">.single-title.animated.pulse.faster</span> <span class="nt">sup</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="na">margin-left</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mf">.4</span><span class="kt">rem</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">color</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mh">#a9a9b3</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="na">font-weight</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="ni">initial</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="o">[</span><span class="nt">theme</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="nt">dark</span><span class="o">]</span> <span class="nc">.archive</span> <span class="nc">.tag-cloud-tags</span> <span class="nt">a</span> <span class="nt">sup</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">color</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mh">#a9a9b3</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cm">/* 分类页面 */</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nc">.archive</span> <span class="nc">.categories-card</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">margin-top</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="kt">rem</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">&amp;</span> <span class="nc">.card-item</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">margin-top</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="kt">rem</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nn">#header-desktop</span> <span class="nc">.header-wrapper</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">padding</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">0</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="kt">rem</span> <span class="mi">0</span> <span class="mi">5</span><span class="kt">vh</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nn">#header-desktop</span> <span class="nc">.header-wrapper</span> <span class="nc">.menu</span> <span class="nc">.menu-item</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">margin</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">0</span> <span class="mf">.3</span><span class="kt">rem</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nc">.menu</span> <span class="nc">.menu-item</span> <span class="nt">i</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">margin-right</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="kt">px</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cm">/* 媒体查询，针对小屏幕调整样式 */</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">@media</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="na">max-width</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">768</span><span class="kt">px</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nc">.footer</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">width</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">90</span><span class="kt">%</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="cm">/* 在小屏幕上宽度调整为100% */</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">padding-left</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="kt">rem</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="cm">/* 减少内边距 */</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">padding-right</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="kt">rem</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">margin</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="mf">.5</span><span class="kt">rem</span> <span class="ni">auto</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="cm">/* 简化外边距设置 */</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">border-top-width</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="kt">px</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="cm">/* 减少边框宽度 */</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nc">.page.archive</span><span class="o">,</span> <span class="nc">.page.single</span><span class="o">,</span> <span class="nc">.page.single.special</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">padding-bottom</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="kt">rem</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="cm">/* 维持底部内边距 */</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">padding-top</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="kt">rem</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="cm">/* 减少顶部内边距 */</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">padding-left</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="kt">rem</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="cm">/* 减少左边内边距 */</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">padding-right</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="kt">rem</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="cm">/* 减少右边内边距 */</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">background</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="nf">rgb</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">255</span><span class="o">,</span> <span class="mi">255</span><span class="o">,</span> <span class="mi">255</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">opacity</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">max-width</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="mi">100</span><span class="kt">%</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="na">width</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="ni">auto</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="评论区复活" class="heading-element"><span>评论区复活</span>
 <a href="#%e8%af%84%e8%ae%ba%e5%8c%ba%e5%a4%8d%e6%b4%bb" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>先前一直用的valine的评论服务，国内的网根本看不到，所以后来形同虚设。</p>
<p>现在换到了utteranc，开源+GitHub，稳稳的很安心。</p>
<h3 id="之后要做的" class="heading-element"><span>之后要做的</span>
 <a href="#%e4%b9%8b%e5%90%8e%e8%a6%81%e5%81%9a%e7%9a%84" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
